meta.title: “Oh, that Munchausen!” - new interactive audiobook game is already on AppleStore and GooglePlay!
meta.description: Listen to the world classic comedy based on the original adventures of Baron Munchausen! Download and listen to Munchausen’s incredible adventures!
meta.keywords: Interactive audiobook, decision game, game choose story, audio game, baron Munchausen, game quest, listen audiobook, listen tale, download audiobook, download adventures

slide1.title: Our guests have already come, let’s start!

slide2.title: “Oh, that Munchausen!” is an interactive audiobook game in which you play the role of a granddaughter and help grandfather Baron remember and tell all his adventures! Get ready and listen!

slide3.title: All incredible adventures of Baron Munchausen, comic plot twists, puzzles and quests, over 250 colorful illustrations and funny animations will surprise and bring you a laugh and a smile!
slide3.title_mobile: All incredible adventures of Baron Munchausen, comic plot twists, puzzles and quests, over 250 colorful illustrations and funny animations will surprise and bring you a laugh and a smile!

slide4.title: Here come Munchausen, his granddaughter and dear guests! All characters were recorded by inimitable actors! Both offline and online modes are available! Over 8 hours of the narration!

slide5.title:
Try the free version for now! Listen to Munchausen's stories anywhere and anytime!
And support us!
slide5.subtitle: All Munchausen’s adventures in one application!

slide6.title: Download, listen and enjoy my incredible adventures!

slide7.title: Open beta now!
slide7.content: Download for free and send us feedback
